title: Republic Day, 1955
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India and M. Bhavnani
brief_description: The pageantry witnessed in the capital on Republic Day. Colorful tableaux representing the achievements and developments of the national plans in different areas, the spectacular parade of the three units of the Armed Forces, and a brilliant display of fireworks.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India and M. Bhavnani
